mainScreen.title: Accept Bitcoin Payments
mainScreen.text: Send, Store, Exchange and Accept Cryptocurrency.

sectionHowItWorks.text: Brief description of how the app works

stepOne.subtitle: Send invoice
stepOne.text: Merchant issues an invoice in their local currency.

stepTwo.subtitle: Payment
stepTwo.text: The user pays in the currency in which it is convenient for him. We take care of all the difficulties with overpayments and underpayments.

stepThree.subtitle: Broadcast
stepThree.text: Conversion and withdrawal, the merchant at any time withdraws his funds to his wallet in the currency in which he is comfortable.

advantage1.subtitle: EU Regulated
advantage1.text: We support KYC compliance for operation in regulated regions.

advantage2.subtitle: All types of crypto
advantage2.text: Bitcoin, altcoins and stable coins are supported.

advantage3.subtitle: Major Blockchains
advantage3.text: Bitcoin, Lightning Network, Liquid Network, Ethereum, Polygon,  BSC and more.

advantage4.subtitle: Free of Charge
advantage4.text: All outgoing transactions, transfers and payouts in crypto are free of charge.

slideOne.subtitle: Merchants Solution
slideOne.textContent: The solution for businesses to accept crypto payments in any coins and automatically exchange it all into desired stable or currency.

slideTwo.subtitle: Enterprise Blockchain Wallets
slideTwo.textContent: We deploy infrastructure to provide coins self-custody for enterprise needs.

slideThree.subtitle: Wallet App
slideThree.textContent: Download Android or iOS application to instantly get access to your account.

slideFour.subtitle: API
slideFour.textContent: Automate acceptance in your web store, CRM or application with our feature full API.

mobileWallet.title: Mobile Wallet
mobileWallet.text: A solution enabling businesses to accept crypto payments in all major coins and exchange it all into Fiat, Coins or StableCoins.

availableCurrencies.title: Available Currencies
availableCurrencies.text: A vast range of major coins, stablecoins and liquid tokens is available.
availableCurrencies.subtitle: Coins

slideOne.title: FOREX & CFD Brokers
slideOne.text: Attract new clients by offering them a way to top up their accounts with many different cryptocurrencies.

slideTwo.title: E-commerce
slideTwo.text: The world of e-commerce has experienced massive growth. Reap the benefits of the huge online market by accepting crypto payments.

slideThree.title: Marketplaces
slideThree.text: There are many platforms used by businesses to sell their products or services. Offering crypto payments to customers is now the advantage.

slideFour.title: Travel Industry
slideFour.text: The travel industry is a growing sector. With increasing bookings now made online, it makes financial sense to accept crypto payments.

slideFive.title: Gambling
slideFive.text: The global online gambling industry is worth billions of dollars. Crypto payments are part for the course.

text.span: and going down based on your total transaction volume.

questions.title: Have a question?
questions.text: Explore our solutions or you can contact us through ticket system and contact form. Feel free to get in touch.

existing.title: For existing clients
existing.text: If you already have an account please use our ticket system.

new.title: For new clients or partners
new.text: Please leave your inquiry and our Business Development Team will contact you shortly.

footer.text: Our vision is to provide convenience and help increase your sales business.

content.questionOne: Can login thoth more 1 people has access per one merchant?
content.answerOne:
In the same Merchant Panel you can create multiple API keys, which can be used to access to the API by multiple people.
Also you can share the wallet seed, that will allow several people to login into the same Merchant Panel, but we DON'T recommend this, because anybody who knows seed phrase can access Merchant Panel.
content.questionTwo: Please have a list with all supporting currencies?
content.answerTwo:
The currencies that are supported to receive:

- BTC (onchain, Lightning Network, Liquid Network)
- ETH
- USDT (Erc20, Trc20, Bep20, Plg20, Liquid Network)
- BUSD (Bep20)
- Tron
- Matic
- BNB
- Stellar XLM
- EURMTL (euro stable in Montenegro)

The fiat currencies that can be used for prices are in the table on merchant manual.
content.answerThree: Go to https://thothpay.com/merchant and scan qr code with Blixt Wallet and next use your profile on dashboard to get API token and URL to API docs.
content.questionFour: What URL for connect any API?
content.answerFour: This is detail for API > https://thothpay.com/swagger/index.html
content.questionFive: Thothpay offer withdraw page? or withdraw can be done only from our wallet? (client can do autonomously from the wallet or we can only do for the client from our wallet?)
content.answerFive: Thothpay provide withdraw for merchant account either by Web UI in thothpay.com/merchant or by API. The merchant should initiate withdraw for client.
content.questionSix: Will they also be able to withdrawal from their trading account to their wallet?
content.answerSix: Thothpay can withdraw in any crypto currency. That is done via API calls from CRM to Thothpay. But, CRM has to track balances of their users. Thothpay manages aggregated balance of whole merchant account only.
content.questionSeven: Can you please guide us from swagger for deposit from which API need to start as we have key now we checked api/signin there is k1 which value will come there?
content.answerSeven: Should use the API key in header to auth the end points from swagger. The k1 is part of auth for merchant panel, not API. Once you get API key in profile page you can auth with it in any API handle.
content.questionEight: Can you tell us once in swagger for deposit which APIs we need to follow please suggest once?
content.answerEight: To make deposit you should check the POST /api/invoice handle. Use "currency" : { "Fiat": "Usd"} for price in dollars. Also, note that 1 usd is 100 in amount field. The amount in API is always in smallest units of the currency.
content.questionNine: What should be base URL for API we need to use?
content.answerNine: https://thothpay.com/api/invoice Swagger prints curl example if you press "Try it out" and then "Execute"
content.questionTen: callback url must be in POST method or get method URL
content.questionEleven: When they created the key. what they have to do next?
content.answerEleven: They should use the key in request http headers in API. How to use it and example they can find in interactive documentation (swagger) https://thothpay.com/swagger
content.questionTwelve: When have a error code on API testing?
content.answerTwelve: Captuer screen shot and give detail that error to support team

pageNotFound.subtitle: Page Not Found
pageNotFound.text: sorry, the page decided to take a little break
